data.title: How do you make your own fundoshi underwear?
data.meta_description:
I was interested in this as well so I did some digging. There
are a number of good websites on this topic but very few of them
give you everything you need, specifically I found it difficult to
determine how much cloth to use. From what I can tell you need
about 2 metres (7 feet) of fabric with a width between 6 and 12
inches (depending on how much coverage you want, how "skimpy" you
want it do be, the size of...what you're covering... etc. Here is a
website with instructions on tying one.
http://www.ehow.com/how_2307565_tie-fundoshi.html
